<h3 id="X11682">X(11682)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-CONWAY AND EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3-3*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a+(b+c)*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11682) = (2*R+3*r)*X(1)-(3*R+2*r)*X(21)</b>
<p>X(11682) lies on these lines:{1,21}, {2,3340}, {8,908}, {9,11526}, {10,6933}, {20,7971}, {40,4511}, {65,3306}, {72,1482}, {78,517}, {92,4673}, {100,7991}, {144,3243}, {145,329}, {200,11531}, {404,2093}, {515,11415}, {518,2098}, {519,1479}, {956,3951}, {958,11011}, {960,2099}, {999,4018}, {1159,5439}, {1260,8158}, {1385,4652}, {1420,3218}, {1699,5086}, {1837,5855}, {2136,3935}, {3057,3870}, {3174,7673}, {3295,4930}, {3338,4084}, {3339,5253}, {3421,10531}, {3434,4301}, {3445,3999}, {3452,5554}, {3616,11529}, {3617,5748}, {3621,3680}, {3622,5744}, {3632,5176}, {3679,11280}, {3681,4853}, {3811,3895}, {3876,9623}, {3885,6765}, {3916,10246}, {3927,10247}, {3940,8148}, {3962,5048}, {4188,5128}, {4308,9965}, {4413,10107}, {5046,5727}, {5057,5691}, {5080,5881}, {5084,11041}, {5552,11362}, {5603,6734}, {5692,11009}, {5905,10106}, {6668,11375}, {6735,6969}, {8125,11535}, {9780,10222}, {11519,11678}, {11521,11679}, {11522,11680}</p>
<p>
X(11682) = reflection of X(78) in X(5730)<br>
X(11682) = anticomplement of X(4848)<br>X(11682) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3869,63), (1,3878,5250), (40,4511,4855), (3811,3895,4917), (3811,5697,3895), (3868,5330,1), (3940,8148,10914), (4301,6737,3434), (4867,5697,3811), (7962,11523,145)<br></p>
